ood cells. These causes can be inherited or acquired. ""Inherited"" means your parents passed the gene for the condition on to you. ""Acquired"" means you aren't born with the condition, but you develop it.
                
Sometimes, the cause of hemolytic anemia isn't known.
                
For more information about the specific causes of hemolytic anemia, go to ""Types of Hemolytic Anemia.""
                
Inherited Hemolytic Anemias
